data.actual_result: The default cursor is shown for the top half of the button, and the hand cursor for the bottom half
data.expected_result: The default cursor is shown for both halves of each button (standard macOS behavior)
data.short_description: macOS close buttons have inconsistent cursors
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord for Mac - Mouse over both the top and bottom halves of the close, minimize, or full screen buttons
